Package com.nxp.osu.osucore

Class OsuCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nxp.osu.osucore.OsuCore
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SecOsuAgent
    public class OsuCore
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class to perform OSU. This class can be extended by different classes according to OEM api flow.

        protected SecOsuStatusCode verifyAndReadDERFile​(java.lang.String filepath)
                                         throws SecOsuException,
                                                java.lang.Exception
        Read and validate DER File parameters.
        Parameters:
        String - filepath: input der file path which need to br read.
        Returns:
        SecOsuStatusCode : returns the error code defined in SecOsuStatusCode enum.
        Throws:
        SecOsuException
        java.lang.Exception

      • getOsuEngineUaiInfo

        protected UAIQueryParser getOsuEngineUaiInfo​(boolean isForceReadReqd)
        Get UAI Info
        Parameters:
        boolean - isForceReadReqd : If this is set, UAI info will be fetched from eSE, though last queried UAI info is available.
        Returns:
        boolean : Returns UAIQueryParser info.
        Throws:
        none

      • checkOsuStatus

        protected SecOsuStatus checkOsuStatus​(boolean checkFile)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      java.lang.Exception
        Determine the current OSU status
        Parameters:
        boolean - checkFile : If this is set will try to determine status on DER file parameter otherwise will try to determine only last OSU was succeed or Teared.
        Returns:
        SecOsuStatus : Object of SecOsuStatus which contains information of OSU status.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

      • finishOsuSteps

        protected boolean finishOsuSteps()
        Does post tasks after OSU deallocate resouces like channel etc
        Returns:
        boolean : True in case of successfully able to deallocate all required resources and post task after OSU otherwise false.
